title: Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Ceramic Room", September 10, 1929
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: NAME OF BUILDING/TITLE OF DRAWING/CONT. NO. DRAW. NO./DATE MADE BY
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite at lower right: REV. 9/26/29; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in stamp, lower right: 


MRS. JOHN D.ROCKEFELLER, JR./10 W. 54th ST N.Y.C./DETAILS OF CERAMIC ROOM/DUNCAN CANDLER/ARCHITECT/DONALD DESKEY/DESIGNER/ 9-10-29, I.S. PERTOFSKY/METAL WORKER/1/H.D. BARBER
description: Plan and elevations for Ceramic Room of Rockefeller apartment. Shelves over a low cabinet surrounding perimeter of room; glass doors enclosing four glass shelves, black glass cabinet doors below. Vertical lights between cabinet units.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Ceramic Room", September 10, 1929.
September 10, 1929. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-466.
